publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2566 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that for Stage 3 of the Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill and Stage 3 of the School Education (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill, debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion at the following times (calculated from the time when Stage 3 of the Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill begins)- Scottish Local Government (Elections) Bill Consideration of Amendments - no later than 1 hour Motion to pass the Bill - no later than 1 hour 30 minutes School Education (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill Consideration of Amendments - no later than 2 hours 30 minutes Motion to pass the Bill - no later than 3 hours Supported by: Euan Robson*
